Article.ArticleTitle: Reply to Ayuso García et al. Health Perception among Female COVID-19 Patients. Comment on "Fernández-de-las-Peñas et al. Female Sex Is a Risk Factor Associated with Long-Term Post-COVID Related-Symptoms but Not with COVID-19 Symptoms: The LONG-COVID-EXP-CM Multicenter Study. J. Clin. Med. 2022, 11, 413".

Abstract.AbstractText: We have read with great interest the comment by Ayuso García et al [...].
